name: calendar
description: Provides an interactive visual representation of a range of dates in one or more month grids
author: allenrabinovich

examples.name: calendar-simple
examples.description: How to create a single-pane calendar with selectable dates

examples.name: calendar-multipane
examples.displayName: Two-Pane Calendar with Custom Rendering and Multiple Selection
examples.description: How to create a multi-pane calendar with custom-rendered cells and multiple date selection.
